backend

Class DVD

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.Resources
      • backend.DVD

  • public class DVD
extends Resources
    DVD is a subclass of the class Resources, which holds the data and methods relevant to only DVD and no other Resources subclasses. This class models the physical object of a DVD owned by TaweLib.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class backend.Resources

        resourceUID, thumbnailImagePath, title, year

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      On creation initializes all required attributes.

      When called replaces variables tied to the DVD resource with newly input variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DVD

        public DVD(java.lang.String director,
           int runTime,
           java.lang.String language,
           java.lang.String subtitleLanguage,
           java.lang.String title,
           java.lang.String year,
           java.lang.String thumbnailImagePath)
        On creation initializes all required attributes.
        Parameters:
        director - name of director.
        runTime - run time of DVD in seconds.
        language - language of the DVD's audio
        subtitleLanguage - language of the DVD's subtitles.
        title - The title of the DVD.
        year - The year the DVD was first released.
        thumbnailImagePath - The file path of the resources thumbnail image.

        runTime - run time of DVD in seconds.

        subtitleLanguage - language of the DVD's subtitles.

        thumbnailImagePath - The file path of the resources thumbnail image.
